text: That ra viec cau xin tha thu cua Ibrahim cho cha cua Y truoc kia chang qua chi vi loi hua ma Y đa hua voi cha minh. Nhung khi (Ibrahim) đa ro rang cha cua minh la ke thu cua Allah, Y đa tach minh ra khoi ong ta. That vay, Ibrahim la nguoi nang cau nguyen (Allah) va co long kien nhan chiu đung
